name: Get Rich Quick (owls_again)
description:
Hey Everyone!

Here's a game that made for a game jam! The challenge was to make a game in less than 3 hrs. The goal of the game is to collect as many coins (which spawn in random positions) as you can in three minutes while avoiding the moving squares, which slow you down.

I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

  • a/left arrow: move left
  • d/right arrow: move right
  • space: jump
  • alt + f4: exit game
